text: phir jab vah pahuncha usake saath chalane-phirane kee aayu ko, to ibraaheem ne kahaah he mere priy putr! main dekh raha hoon svapn mein ki main tujhe vadh kar raha hoon. ab, too bata ki tera kya vichaar hai? usane kahaah he pita! paalan karen, jisaka aadesh aapako diya ja raha hai. aap paayenge mujhe sahanasheelon mein se, yadi allaah kee ichchha hooee
